page.shortlink: api sql namespace table snapshot class
page.description: A SQL::TableSnapshot loads and stores the definition and data for a single table.

parameter.name: CallResult
parameter.description: An object with properties that describe the result of each call to a function of SQL::TableSnapshot. When the function returns false, you can get more complete information concerning the results using the CallResult property.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: The unique name of the snapshot to be used if the snapshot is included in a collection of snapshots.

parameter.name: Row
parameter.description: A collection of SQL::RowSnapshot objects that each contains the data for a specific row.

parameter.name: TableInfo
parameter.description: An object that manages the table definition in the snapshot. The SQL::TableInfo object can be used to generate the scripts to drop and create and update the table.

parameter.name: XML
parameter.description: The persisted XML string that describes the snapshot
